sliderNews.subtitle: What's news?
sliderNews.title: The ultimate hugh speed door
sliderNews.description: FAAC RR5000 offers the ultimate in speed, insulation and efficiency. It’s an entrance solution that combines the fast speeds of a high-performance door with the superior thermal performance of a sectional door. So you’ll never have to compromise.
